scripts.format: npm run format:check && npm run format:fix
scripts.build:client:win: node scripts/client-prebuild.js && electron-builder build -w --publish never && node scripts/client-postbuild.js
scripts.build:client:mac: node scripts/client-prebuild.js && electron-builder build -m --publish never && node scripts/client-postbuild.js
scripts.build:client:linux: node scripts/client-prebuild.js && electron-builder build -l --publish never && node scripts/client-postbuild.js
scripts.build:client:all: node scripts/client-prebuild.js && electron-builder build -mlw --publish never && node scripts/client-postbuild.js
scripts.build:client: node scripts/client-prebuild.js && electron-builder build --publish never && node scripts/client-postbuild.js
scripts.build:server: node scripts/server-prebuild.js && pkg -o dist/server -t latest-win,latest-linux,latest-macos dist/tmp/server.js && node scripts/server-postbuild.js
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
